name: Vermont Maple Syrup Pork Chops
description: A great, simple dish of pork chops, seared and then finished in the oven
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400F.  Heat the butter or oil in a large sauté pan on medium high heat.  Pat dry the chops with paper towels. Lightly salt the pork chops then brown each side in the sauté pan
ingredient: 1/4 cup minced onion, plus 1 medium onion sliced (sliced onion optional)

name: Vermont Maple Syrup Pork Chops
description: A great, simple dish of pork chops, seared and then finished in the oven
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400F.  Heat the butter or oil in a large sauté pan on medium high heat.  Pat dry the chops with paper towels. Lightly salt the pork chops then brown each side in the sauté pan
ingredient: 1 Tbsp apple cider or white vinegar
